subject: This from RBC Royal Bank of Ca
body:
This from RBC Royal Bank of Canada
14 park ave Lac Du Bonnet Manitoba Canada
US$12,000,000,000.00 USD Payment Notification
Hello My Dear.
Your message was well received. However, 
I am here taking an oath with the
100% guaranteeing that you are not paying any other fee apart from this US
$75 to receive your US$12,000,000,000.00 through on-line banking or ATM
Visa Card will be delivered to your doorstep.
you are required to buy only ($75,usd) Steam Wallet Cards Or iTunes card.
The ONLY charge you will ever pay before your package will leave your
address. You will never pay a dime again as agreed and signed down here in
Court of Canada that you will never pay any other money apart from the
($75,usd). SEND THE FEE ONLY TO US TO THIS SUPREME COURT AND WE WILL ORDER
YOUR DELIVERY IMMEDIATELY TODAY OK.
We advise you to try as much as possible to see that you send the US$75
immediately after you receive this massage
Yours Faithfully,
Mr.David I McKay 
royalbankofcanada@cheerful.com

subject: Re: This from RBC Royal Bank of Ca
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about this opportunity. I'm curious, could you please explain more about the Steam Wallet Cards? How do they work and why are they necessary for this process?

Also, could you provide more details about the package that will be delivered to my doorstep? What does it contain?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Henry
